description.value:
Searches for bundles of corresponding observations, media and questionnaire responses. "period" must always be specified.
Additionally at least "patient" or "episodeOfCare" must be specified.
-- patient: Find resource(s) referring the specified patient - Reference(eHealth Patient). episodeOfCare: Find resource(s) referring the specified episode of care - Reference(eHealth EpisodeOfCare). device: Find resource(s) referring the specified device - Reference(eHealth Device). period: Resource(s) must have effective, occurrence or authored attribute within the specified period.
